locale.message: Wonder Backup is an open source, Python-powered, operating system independent backup solution for use in scenarios from end-users to enterprise solutions.

Wonder Backup is free software, though licensing is a difficult legal decision that will be left for a later point in time. Ultimately, I wish for this software to be free for anyone and everyone, and hope to one day find a suitable license.
